verses.name: Genesis 19:9
verses.text: And they said, Stand back. And they said again, This one fellow came in to sojourn, and he will needs be a judge: now will we deal worse with thee, than with them. And they pressed sore upon the man, even Lot, and came near to break the door.

verses.name: Genesis 19:10
verses.text: But the men put forth their hand, and pulled Lot into the house to them, and shut to the door.

verses.name: Genesis 19:11
verses.text: And they smote the men that were at the door of the house with blindness, both small and great: so that they wearied themselves to find the door.
